products.title: Day & Night Effortless Black
products.description: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Palate Black Coal Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Black Gloss Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.description: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.

products.title: Veil Noir Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil noir voile blind has a destinctive stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Noir Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura noir voile roller blind is a great way to add character to your window without compromising on the light. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Bewitch all who befall your mayfair noir dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy.

products.title: Gloss Black Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. The intense hue of gloss black offers a simmering energy to interiors, creating a dramatic backdrop when shuttered struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required all of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Like all the kingston blinds, kingston black pleated perfect fit benefits from a pebble-dash effect across the fabric body that creates an organic texture. The dark black fabric is softened by this dappling texture, while the dimout style further enhances this effect by allowing gentle light levels to flow through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in flush against the window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.
